title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Car Jump Starter - AVAPOW 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter**

Are you tired of being stranded on the side of the road with a dead battery? Do you want a reliable and powerful jump starter that can get you back on the move quickly and safely? Look no further than the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your battery jump starting needs.

With a massive 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter can jump start all gasoline engines and up to 10L diesel engines with ease. Its advanced 12V auto jump box technology ensures a safe and efficient jump starting process, while its intelligent protection systems prevent short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection.

But that's not all. This powerful jump starter also doubles as a portable battery charger, with two USB ports (including a Quick Charge 3.0 port) and a Type-C input/output port, allowing you to charge your devices on the go. The built-in LED light has three modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe - making it perfect for emergency situations.

What's more, this jump starter is designed with convenience in mind. Its rugged and portable design makes it easy to carry around, and it comes with a range of accessories, including jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual.

With the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, you can start your car up to 40 times on a single charge, and its 75% faster charging speed means you can get back on the road quickly. Plus, with our 24-hour online after-sales team, you can trust that you're covered in case you need any assistance.

Don't let a dead battery hold you back. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and enjoy peace of mind on the road.

**Key Features:**

* 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity
* Suitable for all gasoline engines and up to 10L diesel engines
* Advanced 12V auto jump box technology
* Intelligent protection systems (short circuit, low battery, high temperature, reverse connection)
* Portable battery charger with two USB ports (including Quick Charge 3.0) and Type-C input/output port
* Built-in LED light with three modes (flashlight, SOS, strobe)
* Rugged and portable design
* 75% faster charging speed than ordinary power banks
* Up to 40 start times on a single charge
* 24-hour online after-sales team
* Includes range of accessories (jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, user manual)

**Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - The Ultimate Roadside Companion!**

Are you tired of being stranded on the side of the road with a dead battery? Do you need a reliable and powerful jump starter that can get you back on the move in no time? Look no further than the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter!

With a massive 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this beast of a jump starter can jump-start all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L, making it perfect for cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. And with its advanced intelligent protection systems, you can rest assured that your vehicle's electrical system is safe from damage.

But that's not all - this jump starter is also a powerful battery booster power pack, featuring two USB quick charge 3.0 ports, a Type-C input/output port, and a 12V auto jump box. Charge your devices on the go, and enjoy 75% faster charging speeds than ordinary power banks!

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter also comes equipped with a built-in LED light, featuring three modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe. This means you'll never be left in the dark, even in the most unexpected situations.

But what really sets this jump starter apart is its rugged design, metal clamps, and portable carry case. Take it with you on all your adventures, and enjoy peace of mind knowing that you're prepared for anything the road throws your way.

And don't worry about getting stuck - our 24-hour online after-sales team is always here to help. Plus, with 40 start times on a full charge, you can rely on the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter to get you back on the road time and time again.

So why wait? Get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the ultimate in roadside convenience and reliability!

**Package Contents:**

* Portable Battery Starter
* Jumper Cables
* USB-C Cable
* Cigarette Lighter Converter
* Carry Case
* User Manual

**Order Now and Drive with Confidence!**

**Introducing the Ultimate Car Jump Starter: AVAPOW 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter**

Are you tired of being stranded on the side of the road with a dead battery? Do you need a reliable and powerful jump starter that can get you back on the move in no time? Look no further than the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your battery jump starting needs.

With a whopping 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is capable of starting all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines, making it the perfect accessory for cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.

But that's not all - this jump starter is also a powerful battery booster power pack, featuring a 12V auto jump box with LED light, USB quick charge 3.0, and a 4000A peak current. The LED light has three modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe, making it perfect for emergency situations.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter also comes with intelligent protection systems, including short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection, ensuring your safety and the safety of your vehicle.

With two USB charging ports, you can charge your devices on the go, and the type-C input/output port allows for fast and efficient charging. The portable design and rugged construction make it perfect for outdoor use, and the metal clamps ensure a secure connection to your vehicle's battery.

But what really sets this jump starter apart is its incredible performance. With the ability to start your vehicle up to 40 times on a single charge, and charging 75% faster than ordinary power banks, you'll never be left stranded again.

And when you purchase the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, you'll also receive a range of accessories, including jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual.

But don't just take our word for it - our 24-hour online after-sales team is always available to provide support and assistance.

Don't wait any longer - get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the power and convenience of a reliable jump starter. Order now and take the first step towards a worry-free driving experience!
